genColor <- function() {
	color <- sample(1:100, 1)
	if(color < 21) {
		return("White")
	} else if(color < 43) {
		return("Grey")
	} else if(color < 57) {
		return("Black")
	} else if(color < 68) {
		return("Blue")
	} else if(color < 79) {
		return("Red")
	} else if(color < 93) {
		return("Brown")
	} else if(color < 96) {
		return("Yellow")
	} else {
		return("Green")
	}
}

genSticker <- function(type) {
	boo <- sample(1:100, 1)
	if(type == "Sedan")
	{
		if(boo < 30) {
			return(TRUE)
		} else {
			return(FALSE)
		}
	} else if(type == "Truck") {
		if(boo < 35) {
			return(TRUE)
		} else {
			return(FALSE)
		}
	} else if(type == "Van") {
		if(boo < 40) {
			return(TRUE)
		} else {
			return(FALSE)
		}
	} else {
		if(boo < 25) {
			return(TRUE)
		} else {
			return(FALSE)
		}
	}
}

genCar <- function() {
	return(c(genMake(), genColor()))
}

genData <- function() {
	dat <- list()
	dat[[1]] <- c("Car Number", "Make", "Type", "Sticker", "Color")
	i <- 2
	while(i <= 101)
	{
		dat[[i]] <- c((i - 1), genCar())
		i <- i + 1
	}
	return(dat)
}

outputData <- function(dat) {
	write.table(t(as.data.frame(dat)), file = "Data.csv", row.names = FALSE, col.names = FALSE, sep = ",")
}

outputData(genData())
